statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID, BB.ID) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.OrderID , AA.TrackingNo , AA.TotalWeight , AA.ShippedDate , AA.DeliveryDate , AA.Status , AA.Description
, BB.ID as ShipmentItemID , BB.ShipmentID , BB.OrderItemID , BB.ShippedQty
FROM dbo.TShipment AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TShipmentItem BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ShipmentID WHERE AA.OrderID = #OrderID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TShipment AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TShipment ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, OrderID, TrackingNo, TotalWeight, ShippedDate, DeliveryDate, Status, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #OrderID#, #TrackingNo#, #TotalWeight#, #ShippedDate#, #DeliveryDate#, #Status#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TShipment SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, TrackingNo = #TrackingNo# , TotalWeight = #TotalWeight# , ShippedDate = #ShippedDate# , DeliveryDate = #DeliveryDate# , Status = #Status# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
